LanguageData.STAQ.TheRimWorldDefault: Item quality is determined by the default RimWorld algorithm
LanguageData.STAQ.ItemQualityIs: Item quality is based purely on Pawn skill level
LanguageData.STAQ.ItemQualityIs1: Item quality is based on Pawn skill level +/- 1 quality level
LanguageData.STAQ.ItemQualityIs2: Item quality is based on Pawn skill level +/- 2 quality levels
LanguageData.STAQ.CheatQualityIs: Item quality is always Legendary. Still obeys Inspiration settings
LanguageData.STAQ.CraftingEnabled: Whether or not crafting notifications on Masterwork/Legendary items is enabled
LanguageData.STAQ.LegendaryWithInspirationEnabled: Whether or not Legendary items can only be created with inspiration
